p: The color of orange varieties, one of the main attributes that affect customer acceptance, is mainly due to carotenoid pigments, of terpenoid origin (except for the shade of blood orange, which originates from anthocyanin pigments) [ 41, 49]. The carotenoid profile of most sweet orange varieties is dominated by 5,6-epoxycarotenoid ( Figure 14a) and xanthophyll ( Figure 14b) [ 49, 98].
